message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and am interested in purchasing it. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $100 for this item. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $105. It's a fair price considering the value it brings. What do you think?
